title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, November 22, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of novelist George Eliot, born Mary Ann Evans in England (1819). She took a male pseudonym to be taken seriously as a writer.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of novelist George Eliot, born Mary Ann Evans in England (1819). She took a male pseudonym to be taken seriously as a writer.
